newInstance().Description: Creates a new instance of a PullParserFactory that can be used to create XML pull parsers. The factory will always return instances of Android's built-in @B_org#xmlpull#v1#XmlPullParser_E@ and @B_org#xmlpull#v1#XmlSerializer_E@.

XmlPullParserFactory().Description: Protected constructor to be called by factory implementations.

Parameters: boolean: true if the parser produced by this code will provide support for XML namespaces; false otherwise.
setNamespaceAware(boolean).Description: Specifies that the parser produced by this factory will provide support for XML namespaces. By default the value of this is set to false.

Parameters: boolean: - if true the parsers created by this factory must be validating.
setValidating(boolean).Description: Specifies that the parser produced by this factory will be validating (it simply set feature XmlPullParser.FEATURE_VALIDATION to true or false). By default the value of this is set to false.

isNamespaceAware().Description: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which are namespace aware (it simply set feature XmlPullParser.FEATURE_PROCESS_NAMESPACES to true or false).

ClassDesc: This class is used to create implementations of XML Pull Parser defined in XMPULL V1 API.
